plot: Elokuva vangitsee aikaa ("Cinema captures time") is a two-part documentary about Soviet film. The first part, "Inhottava juttu", ('A Nasty Case'), recounts the new wave of Soviet cinema ...
title: Elokuva vangitsee aikaa
